title: Corrections & Amplifications
text:
Quotes attributed to Salesforce.com CEO Marc Benioff in a Heard on the Street column Friday about the company took place during Salesforce's first-quarter conference call in May. The column incorrectly attributed the quotes to the company's second-quarter call on Wednesday.

WeWork had $215 million in revenue in July, up from $209 million in June. A Property Report article on Wednesday about shared office spaces incorrectly said WeWork's revenue in July was up $209 million from June.

Readers can alert The Wall Street Journal to any errors in news articles by emailing wsjcontact@wsj.com or by calling 888-410-2667.

Corrections & Amplifications
